connected_entities: CIA: Primary funder and strategic director (George Tenet founder)
Ruth David: CIA Deputy Director for Science and Technology, co-founder
Palantir Technologies: Major portfolio company (Peter Thiel), CIA seed funding recipient
Keyhole Inc.: Portfolio company acquired by Google, became Google Earth
Google: Indirect connection via Keyhole acquisition, geospatial intelligence
FireEye: Cybersecurity portfolio company, advanced threat detection for IC
NSA: Coordination on signals intelligence and cybersecurity investments
NGA: National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (geospatial tech focus)
Silicon Valley VC firms: Co-investment partnerships (Sequoia, Andreessen Horowitz, etc.)
Defense contractors: Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, Northrop Grumman (technology integration)
Amazon Web Services: Cloud computing for IC (In-Q-Tel portfolio companies often deploy on AWS)
Board members: Former IC officials and tech executives (revolving door)
network_type: CIA venture capital hub connecting intelligence community with commercial technology sector
